panel.field: Remembers the level, exp, and current/max ammo of a weapon when it is removed from the inventory, and restores those values when the weapon is re-added. Note: <TAM adds the ammo to the previously saved ammo of the new weapon, instead of the current ammo of the old weapon. If you want the old vanilla behavior, use an ammo value of 9xxx to add xxx ammo. (Ex: <TAM0005:0010:9000 upgrades the Missile Launcher to Super Missiles, keeping the same ammo count that the old Missile Launcher had as the ammo for the Super Missiles.)
